entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4 except plus 1 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 near noon. High plus 4 except plus 1 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8 except minus 3 along the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8 except minus 3 along the coast. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Sunday 12 March 2023
